title: Open API Ecosystem - Backward Compatible API Versioning for Compliance
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want to ensure that the API design is backward compatible and meets compliance standards so that I can facilitate seamless integration of third-party applications while maintaining regulatory adherence.

title: Comprehensive Developer Documentation for Compliance Integration
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want clear and detailed documentation with step-by-step integration guides for compliance, so that I can ensure our applications are built with compliance-by-design principles and maintain audit readiness.

title: User Consent Management Interfaces
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want the ALFRED system to provide clear user consent management interfaces so that I can ensure compliance with data privacy standards while facilitating secure interactions across our applications.

title: Compliance-Focused Developer Support
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want access to regular webinars and Q&A sessions focused on compliance best practices so that I can ensure that our applications are built with compliance-by-design principles and to stay aligned with industry trends.

title: Compliance-Driven Plugin Architecture
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want an open platform that supports modular extensions through robust APIs so that developers can create applications that ensure compliance-by-design and maintain traceability in user interactions.

title: API Usage Analytics Dashboard
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead, I want to monitor API usage analytics in real-time so that I can ensure compliance and traceability of interactions within the ALFRED system.

title: Interoperability with Third-Party Services - Integration Templates for Compliance-Aware Development
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want to have access to integration templates that facilitate compliance-aware development so that I can ensure our applications maintain legal and regulatory standards while integrating with third-party services.
